The Wan Chai waterfront is dominated by the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre , the largest in Asia , which includes hotels , theaters , and exhibition halls .
The center contains a concert hall with acclaimed acoustics , theaters , a library , an exhibition gallery , shops , restaurants , and bars .

Next door is the Hong Kong Space Museum and Theatre ( open Monday, Wednesday - Friday 1 - 9 pm ; Saturday , Sunday 10 am - 9 pm ; closed Tuesday ; admission HK$10 adults , HK$5 children ; separate admission to theater ) .
